roleset.name: hide
roleset.note: STASH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stash' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from stash.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: A food caterer stashed stones in the false bottom of a milk pail.
example.arg: in the false bottom of a milk pail

roleset.name: hide without location
roleset.note: STASH_AWAY-V NOTES: The adverb/particle eliminates (to my ear) the possibility for alocation argument. (from stash.02-v)

example.name: hoard
example.text: [The 40-year old Mr. Pope]-1 hasn't changed jobs enough -- at least the right ones -- *trace*-1 to stash away that kind of money.
